name: io.github.somacoffeekyoto/imgx
description: AI image generation and editing CLI with provider abstraction. Generate and edit images from text instructions via CLI or MCP server. Works with Claude Code, Cursor, Gemini CLI, and 10+ MCP-compatible tools.

environmentVariables.description: Gemini API key from Google AI Studio. Optional if configured via 'imgx config set api-key'.
environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
